select ei.id, ei.order_id, ei.user_id, ei.content, ei.score, ei.create_date, ei.images,
si.NAME as staffName, si.images as staffImages, si.phone as staffPhone, ui.NAME as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages,
oi.code, oi.order_name oi.order_price oi.receive_date oi.delivery_date oi.kilometre oi.after_order_price oi.plan_minute oi.actual_minute oi.ai_remark
from evaluate_info ei LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ei.user_id = ui.id) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = ei.order_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON (si.id = ci.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.code},'%')
AND si.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.staffName},'%')
AND ui.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.userName},'%')
order by ei.create_date desc
